game.name: Space Porter
game.shortDescription: Space Porter is a 2D top-down puzzle game made in hand-drawn graphics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Space Porter is a 2D top-down puzzle game made in hand-drawn graphics.

reviewHighlights.text: Space Porter is a "template flip", that is to say, it's a "game" that has been produced by copying a game template from GameMaker Studio, changing a f...
An enjoyable little game that has nice music in the background and just helps ya pass some time and relax a bit. Easy to understand and challenging af...
